GP12vampsm_u:423: eṣāmekaikaśaḥ kṛṣṇo na vīryārddhena saṃmitaḥ // VamPSm_8.32 //
GP12vampsm_u:430: tvāmṛte pāpasaṅkalpa ko 'nya evaṃ vadiṣyati // VamPSm_8.35 //
GP12vampsm_u:431: ya ete bhavatā proktāḥ samastā daityadānavāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:439: śocyo 'haṃ yasya me gehe jātastava pitādhamaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:442: kṛṣṇe bhaktirahaṃ tāvadavekṣyo bhavatā na kim // VamPSm_8.41 //
GP12vampsm_u:444: iti jānātyayaṃ loko bhavāṃśca ditinandana // VamPSm_8.42 //
GP12vampsm_u:446: nindāṃ karoṣi tasya tvamakurvan gauravaṃ mama // VamPSm_8.43 //
GP12vampsm_u:450: yasmāt tasmādihaiva tvam aiśvaryād bhrāṃśameṣyasi // VamPSm_8.45 //
GP12vampsm_u:451: sa devo jagatāṃ nātho bale prabhurjanārdanaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:452: nanvahaṃ pratyavekṣyaste bhaktimānatra me guruḥ // VamPSm_8.46 //
GP12vampsm_u:454: nāpekṣitastvayā yasmāt tasmācchāpaṃ dadāmi te // VamPSm_8.47 //
GP12vampsm_u:463: prasādayāmāsa guruṃ praṇipatya punaḥ punaḥ // VamPSm_9.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:465: prasīda tāta mā kopaṃ kuru mohahate mayi /
GP12vampsm_u:470: viṣaṇṇo 'si yathā tāta tathaivāvinaye kṛte // VamPSm_9.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:472: sasāre durlabhāstāta guravo ye bhavadvidhāḥ // VamPSm_9.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:473: prasīda tāta mā kopaṃ kartumarhasi daityapa /
GP12vampsm_u:476: vatsa kopena me moho janitastena te mayā /
GP12vampsm_u:477: śāpo datto vivekaśca mohenāpahṛto mama // VamPSm_9.7 //
GP12vampsm_u:478: yadi mohena me jñānaṃ nākṣiptaṃ syānmahāsura /
GP12vampsm_u:479: tatkathaṃ sarvagaṃ jānan hariṃ kaccicchapāmyaham // VamPSm_9.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:480: yo yaḥ śāpo mayā datto bhavato 'surapuṅgava /
GP12vampsm_u:481: bhāvyametena nūnaṃ te tasmāttvaṃ mā viṣīda vai // VamPSm_9.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:483: bhavethā bhaktimānīśe sa te trātā bhaviṣyati // VamPSm_9.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:484: śāpaṃ prāpya ca me vīra deveśaḥ saṃsmṛtastvayā /
GP12vampsm_u:485: tathā tathā vadiṣyāmi śreyastvaṃ prāpsyase yathā // VamPSm_9.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:488: krameṇa hyudare devo vṛddhiṃ prāpto mahāyaśāḥ // VamPSm_9.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:489: tato māse 'tha daśame kāle prasava āgate /
GP12vampsm_u:490: ajāyata sa govindo bhagavān vāmanākṛtiḥ // VamPSm_9.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:494: dharme ca sarvabhūtānāṃ tadā matirajāyata // VamPSm_9.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:496: tadā hi sarvabhūtānāṃ dharme matirajāyata // VamPSm_9.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:498: jātakarmādikāṃ kṛtvā kriyāṃ tuṣṭāva ca prabhum // VamPSm_9.17 //
GP12vampsm_u:511: jaya sūkṣmātisūkṣma tvaṃ jayānindriya sendriya // VamPSm_9.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:515: sāmprataṃ jaya viśvātman māyāvāmana keśava // VamPSm_9.25 //
GP12vampsm_u:520: na tvāmahaṃ na ceśāno nendrādyāstridaśā hare /
GP12vampsm_u:521: jñātumīśā na munayaḥ sanakādyā na yoginaḥ // VamPSm_9.28 //
GP12vampsm_u:523: kastvāṃ vetsyati sarveśa tvatprasādaṃ vinā naraḥ // VamPSm_9.29 //
GP12vampsm_u:525: sa eva kevalaṃ devaṃ vetti tvāṃ netaro naja // VamPSm_9.30 //
GP12vampsm_u:529: elaṃ stuto hṛṣīkeśaḥ sa tadā vāmanākṛtiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:532: mayā ca vaḥ pratijñātamindrasya bhuvanatrayam // VamPSm_9.33 //
GP12vampsm_u:534: yathā śakrāya dāsyāmi trailokyaṃ hatakaṇṭakam // VamPSm_9.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:535: so 'haṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathendro jagataḥ patiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:536: bhaviṣyati sahasrākṣaḥ satyametad bravīmi vaḥ // VamPSm_9.35 //
GP12vampsm_u:538: yajñopavītaṃ bhagavān dadau tasya bṛhaspatiḥ // VamPSm_9.36 //
GP12vampsm_u:541: āsanaṃ caiva pulahaḥ pulastyaḥ pītavāsasī // VamPSm_9.37 //
GP12vampsm_u:544: sa vāmano jaṭī daṇḍī chatrī dhṛtakamaṇḍaluḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:546: yatra yatra padaṃ viprā bhūbhāge vāmano dadau /
GP12vampsm_u:555: tasya saṃdarśanādeva nāgebhyo na bhayaṃ bhavet // VamPSm_9.44 //
GP12vampsm_u:562: kasmācca nāsurān bhāgān pratigṛhṇanti vahnayaḥ // VamPSm_10.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:563: iti pṛṣṭo 'tha balinā kāvyo vedavidāṃ varaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:564: uvāca daityādhipatiṃ ciraṃ dhyātvā mahāmatiḥ // VamPSm_10.3 //
GP12vampsm_u:570: neyaṃ bhūtapatiṃ bhūmiḥ samarthā voḍhumīśvaram // VamPSm_10.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:577: bhuñjate nāsurān bhāgānapi tena trayo 'gnayaḥ // VamPSm_10.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:580: yajñamabhyāgato brahman mattaḥ ko 'nyo 'dhikaḥ pumān // VamPSm_10.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:586: tvayā tu dānavā daitya yajñabhāgabhujaḥ kṛtāḥ // VamPSm_10.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:587: ayaṃ ca devaḥ sattvasthaḥ karoti sthitipālanam /
GP12vampsm_u:588: visṛṣṭaṃ ca tathāyaṃ ca svayamatti prajāḥ prabhuḥ // VamPSm_10.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:589: bhavāṃstu vandī bhavitā nūnaṃ viṣṇuḥ sthitau sthitaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:590: viditvaivaṃ mahābhāgā kuru yat te manogatam // VamPSm_10.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:592: pratijñā naiva voḍhavyā vācyaṃ sāma tathāphalam // VamPSm_10.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:594: alaṃ dadyāṃ dhanaṃ deve tvetadvācyaṃ tu yācataḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:600: sa me vakṣyati dehīti govindaḥkimato 'dhikam // VamPSm_10.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:602: yajñā kriyante yajñeśaḥ sa me dehīti vakṣyati // VamPSm_10.19 //
GP12vampsm_u:603: tatsādhu sukṛtaṃ karma tapaḥ sucaritaṃ canaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:604: yanmā dehīti viśveśaḥ svayameva vadiṣyati // VamPSm_10.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:606: prāṇatyāgaṃ kariṣye 'haṃ na tu nāsti jane kvacit // VamPSm_10.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:610: na bādhākāri yaddānaṃ tadaṅgaṃ balavat smṛtam // VamPSm_10.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:611: madrājye nāsukhī kaścinna daridro na cāturaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:612: na duḥkhito na cobdigno na śamādivivarjitaḥ // VamPSm_10.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:614: janaḥ sarvo mahābhāga kimutāhaṃ sadā sukhī // VamPSm_10.25 //
GP12vampsm_u:618: mama dānamavāpyāsau puṣṇāti yadi devatāḥ // VamPSm_10.27 //
GP12vampsm_u:620: janārdane mahāpātre kiṃ na prāptaṃ tato mayā // VamPSm_10.28 //
GP12vampsm_u:626: māṃ nihantuṃ tato hi syād vadhaḥ ślāghyataro 'cyutāt // VamPSm_10.31 //
GP12vampsm_u:628: naiva bhāvyaṃ jagannāthe govinde samupasthite // VamPSm_10.32 //
GP12vampsm_u:632: taṃ dṛṣṭvā yajñavāṭaṃ tu praviṣṭamasurāḥ prabhum /
GP12vampsm_u:633: jagmuḥ prabhāvataḥ kṣobhaṃ tejasā tasya niṣprabhāḥ // VamPSm_10.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:635: vasiṣṭho gādhijo gargo anye ca munisattamāḥ // VamPSm_10.35 //
GP12vampsm_u:637: tataḥ saṃkṣobhamāpanno na kaścit kiñciduktavān // VamPSm_10.36 //
GP12vampsm_u:639: athāsurapati prahvaṃ dṛṣṭvā munivarāśca tān // VamPSm_10.37 //
GP12vampsm_u:646: pūjayāmāsa govindaṃ prāha cedaṃ mahāsuraḥ // VamPSm_10.40 //
GP12vampsm_u:649: striyo vastrāṇyalaṅkārān gāvo grāmāśca puṣkalāḥ // VamPSm_10.41 //
GP12vampsm_u:650: sarve ca saralā pṛthvī bhavato vā yadīpsitam /
GP12vampsm_u:651: tad dadāsi vṛṇuṣveṣṭaṃ mamārthāḥ santi te priyāḥ // VamPSm_10.42 //
GP12vampsm_u:657: tribhiḥ prayojanaṃ kiṃ te padaiḥ padavatāṃ vara /
GP12vampsm_u:658: śataṃ śatasahasraṃ vā padānāṃ mārgatāṃ bhavān // VamPSm_10.45 //
GP12vampsm_u:663: vācayāmāsa vai tasmai vāmanāya mahātmane // VamPSm_10.47 //
GP12vampsm_u:666: cantrasūryau tu nayane dyauḥ śiraścaraṇau kṣitiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:671: tārakā romakūpāṇi romeṣu ca maharṣayaḥ // VamPSm_10.51 //
GP12vampsm_u:673: aśvinau śravaṇe tasya nāsā vāyurmahātmanaḥ // VamPSm_10.52 //
GP12vampsm_u:674: prasāde candramā devo mano dharmaḥ samāśritaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:675: satyamasyābhavad vāṇī jihvā devī sarasvatī // VamPSm_10.53 //
GP12vampsm_u:677: svargadvāramabhūnmaitraṃ tvaṣṭā pūṣā ca vai bhruvau // VamPSm_10.54 //
GP12vampsm_u:679: hṛdayaṃ ca paraṃ brahma puṃstvaṃ vai kaśyapo muniḥ // VamPSm_10.55 //
GP12vampsm_u:681: vakṣasthale tathā rudro dhairye cāsya mahārṇavaḥ // VamPSm_10.56 //
GP12vampsm_u:683: lakṣmīrmedhā dhṛtiḥ kāntiḥ sarvavidyāśca vai kaṭiḥ // VamPSm_10.57 //
GP12vampsm_u:686: tanau kukṣiṣu vedāśca jānunī ca mahāmakhāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:687: iṣṭayaḥ paśavaścāsya dvijānāṃ ceṣṭitāni ca // VamPSm_10.59 //
GP12vampsm_u:689: upasarpanti te daityāḥ pataṅgā iva pāvakam // VamPSm_10.60 //
GP12vampsm_u:693: kṛtvā rūpaṃ mahākāyaṃ saṃjahārāśu medinīm // VamPSm_10.62 //
GP12vampsm_u:703: yat tvayā salilaṃ dattaṃ gṛhītaṃ pāṇinā mayā // VamPSm_10.67 //
GP12vampsm_u:705: vaivakhate tathātīte kāle manvantare tathā // VamPSm_10.68 //
GP12vampsm_u:707: idānīṃ bhuvanaṃ sarvaṃ dattaṃ śakrāya vai purā // VamPSm_10.69 //
GP12vampsm_u:709: niyantavyā mayā sarve ye tasya paripanthinaḥ // VamPSm_10.70 //
GP12vampsm_u:711: sutalaṃ nāma pātālaṃ samāsādya vaco mama // VamPSm_10.71 //
GP12vampsm_u:719: yāvatsuraiśca vipraiśca na virodhaṃ gamiṣyasi // VamPSm_10.75 //
GP12vampsm_u:721: yadā suraiśca vipraiśca virodhaṃ tvaṃ kariṣyasi /
GP12vampsm_u:722: bandhiṣyanti tadā pāsā vāruṇā ghoradarśanāḥ // VamPSm_10.76 //
GP12vampsm_u:726: āpyāyito yena deva smareyaṃ tvāmahaṃ sadā // VamPSm_10.77 //
GP12vampsm_u:729: hutānyaśraddhayā yāni tāni dāsyanti te phalam // VamPSm_10.78 //
GP12vampsm_u:731: phalāni tava dāsyanti adhītānyavratāni ca // VamPSm_10.79 //
GP12vampsm_u:732: udakena vinā pūjā vinā darbeṇa yā kriyā /
GP12vampsm_u:733: ājyena ca vinā homaṃ phalaṃ dāsyanti te bale // VamPSm_10.80 //
GP12vampsm_u:735: na tatra cāsuro bhāgo bhaviṣyati kadācana // VamPSm_10.81 //
GP12vampsm_u:737: ye ca śrāddhāni dāsyanti vrataṃ niyamameva ca // VamPSm_10.82 //
GP12vampsm_u:738: kriyā kṛtā ca yā kācid vidhināvidhināpi vā /
GP12vampsm_u:739: sarvaṃ tadakṣayaṃ tasya bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_10.83 //
GP12vampsm_u:741: dvādaśyāṃ vāmanaṃ dṛṣṭvā snātvā viṣṇupade hvade /
GP12vampsm_u:742: dānaṃ dattvā yathāśaktyā prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_10.84 //
GP12vampsm_u:745: vyāpinā tena rūpeṇa jagāmādarśanaṃ hariḥ // VamPSm_10.85 //
GP12vampsm_u:747: niḥśeṣaṃ ca tadā kālaṃ baliḥ pātālamāsthitaḥ // VamPSm_10.86 //
GP12vampsm_u:749: vāmanasya śṛṇvan yastu sarvapāṣaiḥ pramucyate // VamPSm_10.87 //
GP12vampsm_u:751: balerviṣṇośca caritaṃ ye smariṣyanti mānavāḥ // VamPSm_10.88 //
GP12vampsm_u:752: nādhayo vyādhayasteṣāṃ na ca mohākulaṃ manaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:755: samāpneti mahābhāgā naraḥ śrutvā kathāmimām // VamPSm_10.90 //
GP12vampsm_u:758: vāmanasya ca māhatmyaṃ śṛṇvan pāpaiḥ pramucyate // VamPSm_10.91 //
GP12vampsm_u:764: kathaṃ saraḥ samāsādya kṛtvā tīrthāni pārśvataḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:766: etad vistarato brūhi tīrthaṃvaṃśaṃ sanātanam // VamPSm_11.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:771: praviṣṭā puṇyatoyaughā vanaṃ dvaitamiti smṛtam // VamPSm_11.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:772: tasmin palkṣe sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmuniḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:773: praṇipatya tadā mūrdhnā tuṣṭāvātha sarasvatīm // VamPSm_11.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:774: tvaṃ devi sarvalokānāṃ mātā devāraṇiḥ śubhā /
GP12vampsm_u:776: tat sarvaṃ tvayi saṃyogi yogivad devi saṃsthitam /
GP12vampsm_u:777: akṣaraṃ paramaṃ devī yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam /
GP12vampsm_u:778: akṣaraṃ paramaṃ brahma viśvaṃ caitat kṣarātmakam // VamPSm_11.7 //
GP12vampsm_u:780: tathā tvayi sthitaṃ brahma jagaccedamaśeṣataḥ // VamPSm_11.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:782: tatra mātrātrayaṃ sarvamasti yad devi nāsti ca // VamPSm_11.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:784: trīṇi jyotīṃṣi vargāśca trayo dharmādayastathā // VamPSm_11.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:793: tavaitat paramaṃ rūpaṃ yanna śakyaṃ mayoditum /
GP12vampsm_u:794: na cāsyena na vā jihvātālvoṣṭhādibhirucyate // VamPSm_11.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:795: sa viṣṇuḥ sa vṛṣo brahma candrākrajyotireva ca /
GP12vampsm_u:800: anākhyaṃ ṣaḍguṇākhyaṃ ca bahvākhyaṃ triguṇāśrayam // VamPSm_11.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:802: sukhāt sukhaṃ mahātsaukhyaṃ rūpaṃ tattvaguṇātmakam // VamPSm_11.19 //
GP12vampsm_u:803: evaṃ devi tvayā vyāptaṃ sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ ca yat /
GP12vampsm_u:804: advaitāvasthitaṃ brahma yacca dvaite vyavasthitam // VamPSm_11.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:805: ye'rthā nityā ye vinaśyanti cānye ye'rthāḥ sthūlā ye tathā santi sūkṣmāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:806: ye vā bhūmau ye 'ntarikṣenyato vā teṣāṃ devi tvatta evopalabdhiḥ // VamPSm_11.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:807: yadvā mūrtaṃ yadamūrtaṃ samastaṃ yadvā bhūteṣvekamekaṃ ca kiñcit /
GP12vampsm_u:808: yacca dvaite vyastabhūtaṃ ca lakṣyaṃ tatsaṃbaddhaṃ tvatsvarairvyañjanaiśca // VamPSm_11.22 //
GP12vampsm_u:809: evaṃ stutā tadā devī viṣṇorjihvā sarasvatī /
GP12vampsm_u:811: yatra tvaṃ neṣyase vipra tatra yāsyāmyatandritā // VamPSm_11.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:813: ādyaṃ brahmasaraḥ puṇyaṃ tato rāmahvadaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:814: kuruṇā ṛṣiṇā puṣṭaṃ kurukṣetraṃ tataḥ smṛtam /
GP12vampsm_u:815: tasya madhyena vai gāḍhaṃ puṇyā puṇyajalāvahā // VamPSm_11.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:820: nadī pravāhasaṃyuktā kurukṣetraṃ viveśa ha // VamPSm_12.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:821: tatra sā rantukaṃ prāpya puṇyatoyā sarasvatī /
GP12vampsm_u:822: kurakṣetraṃ samāplāvya prayātā paścimāṃ diśam // VamPSm_12.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:827: ye smaranti ca tīrthāni devatāḥ prīṇayanti ca /
GP12vampsm_u:828: snānti ca śraddadhānāśca te yānti paramāṃ gatim // VamPSm_12.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:829: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gato 'pi vā /
GP12vampsm_u:830: yaḥ smaret kurukṣetraṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraḥ śuciḥ // VamPSm_12.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:834: vāsaḥ puṃsāṃ kurukṣetre muktiruktā caturvidhā // VamPSm_12.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:836: taṃ devanirmitaṃ deśaṃ brahmavartaṃ pracakṣate // VamPSm_12.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:838: evaṃ yaḥ satataṃ brūyāt so 'pi pāṣaiḥ pramucyate // VamPSm_12.10 //
GP12vampsm_u:840: tasya jñānaṃ brahmamayamutpatsyati na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_12.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:842: tasya saṃsevanānnityaṃ brahma cātmani paśyati // VamPSm_12.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:843: cañcalaṃ hi manuṣyatvaṃ prāpya ye mokṣakāṅkiṇaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:846: paśyanti nirmalaṃ devaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ sanātanam // VamPSm_12.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:847: brahmavediḥ kurukṣetraṃ puṇyaṃ sānnihitaṃ saraḥ // VamPSm_12.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:849: kurukṣetre mṛtānāṃ ca patanaṃ naiva vidyate // VamPSm_12.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:852: gatvā tu śraddhāyā yuktaḥ snātvā sthāṇumahāhvade /
GP12vampsm_u:853: manasā cintitaṃ kāmaṃ labhate nātra saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_12.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:854: niyamaṃ ta tataḥ kṛtvā gatvā saraḥ pradakṣiṇam /
GP12vampsm_u:855: rantukaṃ ca samāsādya kṣamayitvā punaḥ punaḥ // VamPSm_12.19 //
GP12vampsm_u:856: sarasvatyāṃ naraḥ snātvā yakṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇamya ca /
GP12vampsm_u:857: puṣpaṃ dhūpaṃ ca naivaidyaṃ datvā vācamudīrayet // VamPSm_12.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:858: tava prasādād yakṣendra vānāni saritaśca yāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:859: bhramiṣyāmi ca tīrthāni avighneṃ kuru me sadā // VamPSm_12.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:863: vanāni sapta no brūhi nava nadyaśca yāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:864: tīrthāni ca samagrāṇi tīrthasnānaphalaṃ tathā // VamPSm_13.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:865: yena yena vidhānena yasya tīrthasya yat phalam /
GP12vampsm_u:866: tat sarvaṃ vistateṇeha brūhi paurāṇikottama // VamPSm_13.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:869: yeṣāṃ nāmāni puṇyāni sarvapāpaharāṇi ca // VamPSm_13.3 //
GP12vampsm_u:870: kāmyakaṃ ca vanaṃ puṇyaṃ tathāditivanaṃ mahat /
GP12vampsm_u:871: vyāsasya ca vanaṃ puṇyaṃ phalakīvanameva ca // VamPSm_13.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:874: vanānyetāni vai sapta nadīḥ śṛṇuta me dvijāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:875: sarasvatī nadī puṇyā tathā vaitaraṇī nadī // VamPSm_13.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:876: āpagā ca mahāpuṇyā gaṅgā mandākinī nadī /
GP12vampsm_u:882: tīrthasya ca prabhāveṇa puṇyā hyetāḥ saridvarāḥ // VamPSm_13.9 //
GP12vampsm_u:885: rantukaṃ ca naro dṛṣṭvā dvārapālaṃ mahābalam /
GP12vampsm_u:888: adityā yatra gutrārthaṃ kṛtaṃ ghoraṃ mahattapaḥ // VamPSm_13.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:889: tatra snātvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca aditiṃ devamātaram /
GP12vampsm_u:893: savanaṃ nāma vikhyātaṃ yatra saṃnihito hariḥ // VamPSm_13.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:894: vimale ca naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā ca vimaleśvaram /
GP12vampsm_u:895: nirmalaṃ svargamāyāti rudralokaṃ ca gacchati // VamPSm_13.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:899: tatra snātvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca brahmāṇaṃ vedasaṃyutam // VamPSm_13.17 //
GP12vampsm_u:902: saṃgame ca naraḥ snātvā prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_13.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:904: kṣāntiyukto naraḥ snātvā prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_13.19 //
GP12vampsm_u:906: sarvāṇi kṣamate tasya snātamātrasya dehinaḥ // VamPSm_13.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:907: tato dakṣāśramaṃ gatvā dṛṣṭvā dekṣeśvaraṃ śivam /
GP12vampsm_u:908: aśvamedhasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ // VamPSm_13.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:909: tataḥ śālūkinīṃ gatvā snātvā tīrthe dvijottamāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:913: tatra snānaṃ naraḥ kṛtvā mukto nāgabhayād bhavet // VamPSm_13.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:914: tato gaccheta viprendrā dvārapālaṃ tu rantukam /
GP12vampsm_u:915: tatroṣya rajanīmekāṃ snātvā tīrthavare śubhe // VamPSm_13.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:917: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā ca praṇipatya kṣamāpayet // VamPSm_13.25 //
GP12vampsm_u:918: tava prasādād yakṣendra mukto bhavati kilbiṣaiḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:920: evaṃ prasādya yakṣendraṃ tataḥ pañcanadaṃ vrajet // VamPSm_13.26 //
GP12vampsm_u:922: tatra sarveṣu lokeṣu tīrthaṃ pañcanadaṃ smṛtam // VamPSm_13.27 //
GP12vampsm_u:925: tasmin tīrthe naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā koṭīśvaraṃ haram /
GP12vampsm_u:928: tatrāpi ca naraḥ snātvā hyagniṣṭomaphalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_13.30 //
GP12vampsm_u:930: rūpasya bhāgī bhavati yaśasvī ca bhavennaraḥ // VamPSm_13.31 //
GP12vampsm_u:932: tasmin snātvā śraddadhānaḥ prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_13.32 //
GP12vampsm_u:935: tatra someśvare dṛṣṭvā snātvā tīrthavare śubhe /
GP12vampsm_u:936: rājasūyasya yajñasya phalaṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ // VamPSm_13.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:940: tāvubhau liṅgāvabhyarcya na bhūyo janma cāpnuyāt // VamPSm_13.36 //
GP12vampsm_u:944: tato muñjavaṭaṃ nāma mahādevasya dhīmataḥ // VamPSm_13.38 //
GP12vampsm_u:946: tatraiva ca mahāgrāhī yakṣiṇī lokaviśrutā // VamPSm_13.39 //
GP12vampsm_u:951: puṣkaraṃ ca tato gatvā abhyarcya pitṛdevatāḥ // VamPSm_13.41 //
GP12vampsm_u:953: kṛtakṛtyo bhaved rājā aśvamedhaṃ ca vindati // VamPSm_13.42 //
GP12vampsm_u:954: kanyādānaṃ ca yastatra kārtikyāṃ vai kariṣyati /
GP12vampsm_u:957: vighnaṃ karoti pāpānāṃ durgati ca prayacchati // VamPSm_13.44 //
GP12vampsm_u:959: āhatya dundubhiṃ tatra bhramate nityameva hi // VamPSm_13.45 //
GP12vampsm_u:960: sā dadarśa striyaṃ caikāṃ saputrāṃ pāpadeśajām /
GP12vampsm_u:961: tāmuvāca tadā yakṣī āhatya niśi dundubhim // VamPSm_13.46 //
GP12vampsm_u:963: tadvad bhūtālaye snātvā saputrā vastumicchasi // VamPSm_13.47 //
GP12vampsm_u:964: divā mayā te kathitaṃ rātrau bhakṣyāmi niścitam /
GP12vampsm_u:965: etacchrutvā tu vacanaṃ praṇipatya ca yakṣiṇīm // VamPSm_13.48 //
GP12vampsm_u:966: uvāca dīnayā vācā prasādaṃ kuru bhāmini /
GP12vampsm_u:967: tataḥ sā yakṣiṇī tāṃ tu provāca kṛpayānvitā // VamPSm_13.49 //
GP12vampsm_u:968: yadā sūryasya grahaṇaṃ kālena bhavitā kvacit /
GP12vampsm_u:969: saṃnihatyāṃ tadā snātvā pūtā svargaṃ kamiṣyasi // VamPSm_13.50 //
GP12vampsm_u:974: yatra rāmeṇa vipreṇa tarasā dīptatejasā // VamPSm_14.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:976: pūrayitvā naravyāghra rudhireṇeti naḥ śrutam // VamPSm_14.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:979: rāma rāma mahābāho prītāḥ smastava bhārgava /
GP12vampsm_u:980: anayā pitṛbhaktyā ca vikrameṇa ca te vibho // VamPSm_14.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:981: varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te kimicchasi mahāyaśaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:982: evamuktastu pitṛbhī rāmaḥ prabhavatāḥ paraḥ // VamPSm_14.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:983: abravīt prāñjalirvākyaṃ sa pitṛn gagane sthitān /
GP12vampsm_u:984: bhavanto yadi me prītā yadya nugrāhyatā mayi // VamPSm_14.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:994: hradāśca tava tīrthatvaṃ gamīṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_14.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:995: hradeṣveteṣu ye snātvā svān pitṝṃstarpayanti ca /
GP12vampsm_u:996: tebhyo dāsyanti pitaro yathābhilaṣitaṃ varam // VamPSm_14.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:997: īpsitān mānasān kāmān svargavāsaṃ ca śāśvatam /
GP12vampsm_u:998: evaṃ dattvā varān viprā rāmasya pitarastadā // VamPSm_14.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:1000: evaṃ rāmahradāḥ puṇyā bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ // VamPSm_14.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:1002: rāmamabhyarcya śraddhāvān vinded bahu suvarṇakam // VamPSm_14.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:1004: svavaṃśasiddhaye viprāḥ snātvā vai vaṃśamūlake // VamPSm_14.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:1013: lokā yatroddhatāḥ sarve viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // VamPSm_14.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:1015: snātvātīrthavare tasmin lokān paśyati śāśvatān // VamPSm_14.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:1016: yatra viṣṇuḥ sthito nityaṃ śivo devaḥ sanātanaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1017: tau devau praṇipātena prasādya muktimāpnuyāt // VamPSm_14.22 //
GP12vampsm_u:1019: tatra snātasya sānnidhyaṃ sadā devī prayacchati // VamPSm_14.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:1021: tatra snātvār'cayitvā ca daivatāni pitṛstathā // VamPSm_14.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:1023: tatra sthitaṃ mahādevaṃ kāpilaṃ vapurāsthitam // VamPSm_14.25 //
GP12vampsm_u:1033: udgārāt surabhirjātā sā ca pātālamāśritā // VamPSm_14.30 //
GP12vampsm_u:1037: āhutā brahmaṇā tāśca vibhrāntā vivareṇa hi // VamPSm_14.32 //
GP12vampsm_u:1038: tasmin vivaradvāre tu sthito gaṇapatiḥ svayam /
GP12vampsm_u:1039: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā sakalān kāmān prāpnotisaṃyatendriyaḥ // VamPSm_14.33 //
GP12vampsm_u:1041: devyāstīrthe naraḥ snātvā labhate rūpamuttamam // VamPSm_14.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:1043: bhogāṃśca vipulān bhuktvā prāpnoti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_14.35 //
GP12vampsm_u:1045: bhavate nātra sandehaḥ prāṇān muñcati svecchayā // VamPSm_14.36 //
GP12vampsm_u:1046: tato gaccheta viprendrā dvārapālaṃ tu rantukam /
GP12vampsm_u:1047: tasya tīrthaṃ sarasvatyāṃ yakṣendrasya mahātmanaḥ // VamPSm_14.37 //
GP12vampsm_u:1049: yakṣasya ca prasādena labhate kāmikaṃ phalam // VamPSm_14.38 //
GP12vampsm_u:1051: brahmāvarte naraḥ snātvā brahma cāpnoti niścitam // VamPSm_14.39 //
GP12vampsm_u:1053: tatra saṃnihitā nityaṃ pitaro daivataiḥ saha // VamPSm_14.40 //
GP12vampsm_u:1057: kāmeśvarasya tīrthaṃ tu snātvā śraddhāsamanvitaḥ // VamPSm_14.42 //
GP12vampsm_u:1059: mātṛtīrthaṃ ca tatraiva yatra snātasya bhaktitaḥ // VamPSm_14.43 //
GP12vampsm_u:1063: punāti darśanādeva daṇḍakaṃ ca dvijottamāḥ // VamPSm_14.45 //
GP12vampsm_u:1064: keśānabhyukṣya vai tasmin pūto bhavati pāpataḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1065: tatra tīrthavaraṃ cānyat svānulomāyanaṃ mahat // VamPSm_14.46 //
GP12vampsm_u:1069: pūtātmānaśca te viprāḥ prayānti paramāṃ gatim // VamPSm_14.48 //
GP12vampsm_u:1071: tatra snātvā bhaktiyuktastadeva labhate phalam // VamPSm_14.49 //
GP12vampsm_u:1073: darśanāt tasya tīrthasya mukto bhavati kilbiṣaiḥ // VamPSm_14.50 //
GP12vampsm_u:1076: tato vyādhāśca te sarve tānapṛcchan dvijottamān /
GP12vampsm_u:1077: mṛgā anena vai yātā asmābhiḥ śarapīḍitāḥ // VamPSm_14.52 //
GP12vampsm_u:1078: nimagnāste saraḥ prāpya kva te yātā dvijottamāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1079: te 'bruvaṃstatra vai pṛṣṭā vayaṃ te ca dvijottamāḥ // VamPSm_14.53 //
GP12vampsm_u:1081: tasmād yūyaṃ śraddadhānāḥ snātvā tīrthe vimatsarāḥ // VamPSm_14.54 //
GP12vampsm_u:1083: tataḥ snātāśca te sarve śuddhadehā divaṃ gatāḥ // VamPSm_14.55 //
GP12vampsm_u:1085: ye śṛṇvanti śraddadhānāste 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim // VamPSm_14.56 //
GP12vampsm_u:1090: āpagā nāma vikhyātā nadī dvijaniṣevitā // VamPSm_15.1 //
GP12vampsm_u:1092: ye prayacchanti viprebhyasteṣāṃ pāpaṃ na vidyate // VamPSm_15.2 //
GP12vampsm_u:1093: ye tu śrāddhaṃ kariṣyanti prāpya tāmāpagāṃ nadīm /
GP12vampsm_u:1094: te sarvakāmasaṃyuktā bhaviṣyanti na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_15.3 //
GP12vampsm_u:1095: śaṃsanti sarve pitaraḥ smaranti ca pitāmahāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1096: asmākaṃ ca kule putraḥ pautro vāpi bhaviṣyati // VamPSm_15.4 //
GP12vampsm_u:1097: ya āpagāṃ nadīṃ gatvā tilaiḥ saṃtarpayiṣyati /
GP12vampsm_u:1098: tena tṛptā bhaviṣyāmo yāvatkalpaśataṃ gatam // VamPSm_15.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:1100: caturdaśyāṃ tu madhyāhne piṇḍado muktimāpnuyāt // VamPSm_15.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:1107: etaiḥ sametya tatkuṇḍaṃ kalpitaṃ bhuvi durlabham /
GP12vampsm_u:1111: devān pitṝn samuddiśya yo vipraṃ bhojayiṣyati /
GP12vampsm_u:1112: pitarastasya sukhitā dāsyanti bhuvi durlabham // VamPSm_15.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:1114: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca prasādena saptalokādhipo bhavet // VamPSm_15.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:1116: yasmin sthitaḥ khayaṃ devo vṛddhakedārasaṃjñitaḥ // VamPSm_15.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:1120: diṇḍidevaṃ namaskṛtya kedārasya phalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_15.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:1123: kalasyāṃ tu tato gacched yatra devī svayaṃ sthitā /
GP12vampsm_u:1124: durgā kātyāyanī bhadrā nidrā māyā sanātanī // VamPSm_15.18 //
GP12vampsm_u:1125: kalasyāṃ ca naraḥ snātvā dṛṣṭvā durgā taṭe sthitām /
GP12vampsm_u:1128: kṛṣṇapakṣe caturdaśyāṃ dṛṣṭvā devaṃ maheśvaram // VamPSm_15.20 //
GP12vampsm_u:1130: tisrāḥ koṭyastu tīrthānāṃ sarake dvijasattamāḥ // VamPSm_15.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:1132: tasmin sare ca yaḥ snātvā rudrakoṭiṃ smarennaraḥ // VamPSm_15.22 //
GP12vampsm_u:1136: iḍāspadaṃ ca tatraiva tīrthaṃ pāpabhayāpaham // VamPSm_15.24 //
GP12vampsm_u:1141: tatra snātvā tu puruṣaḥ sarvadānaphalaṃ labhet /
GP12vampsm_u:1142: kiṃrūpaṃ ca mahātīrthaṃ tatraiva bhuvi durlabham // VamPSm_15.27 //
GP12vampsm_u:1146: tiryagyonau sthito viṣṇuḥ siṃheṣu ratimāpnuvan // VamPSm_15.29 //
GP12vampsm_u:1147: tato devāḥ sagandharvā ārāghya varadaṃ śivam /
GP12vampsm_u:1151: yudhyamānau tu tau devau patitau saramadhyataḥ // VamPSm_15.31 //
GP12vampsm_u:1155: tau dṛṣṭvā tatra puruṣau tuṣṭāva bhaktibhāvitaḥ // VamPSm_15.33 //
GP12vampsm_u:1157: haraye ca umābhartre sthitikālabhṛte namaḥ // VamPSm_15.34 //
GP12vampsm_u:1160: dhanyo 'haṃ sukṛtī nityaṃ yad dṛṣṭo puruṣottamau /
GP12vampsm_u:1163: ya ihāgatya snātvā ca pitṝn saṃtarpayiṣyati /
GP12vampsm_u:1165: aśvatthasya tu yanmūlaṃ sadā tatra vasāmyaham /
GP12vampsm_u:1166: aśvatthavandanaṃ kṛtvā yamaṃ raudraṃ na paśyati // VamPSm_15.38 //
GP12vampsm_u:1168: pauṇḍarīke naraḥ snātvā puṇḍarīkaphalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_15.39 //
GP12vampsm_u:1170: snānaṃ japaṃ tathā śrāddhaṃ muktimārgapradāyakam // VamPSm_15.40 //
GP12vampsm_u:1172: tatra vaitaraṇī puṇyā nadī pāpapramocanī // VamPSm_15.41 //
GP12vampsm_u:1178: pūjayitvā śivaṃ tatra pāpalepo na vidyate // VamPSm_15.44 //
GP12vampsm_u:1180: yatra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ sādhyāśca ṛṣayaḥ sthitāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1182: dṛṣadvatyāṃ naraḥ snātvā tarpayitvā ca devatāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1184: somakṣaye ca saṃprāpte somasya ca dine tathā /
GP12vampsm_u:1185: yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kurute martyastasya puṇyaphalaṃ śṛṇu // VamPSm_15.47 //
GP12vampsm_u:1186: gayāyāṃ ca yatā śrāddha pitṛn prīṇāti nityaśaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1187: tathā śrāddhaṃ ca kartavyaṃ phalakīvanamāśritaiḥ // VamPSm_15.48 //
GP12vampsm_u:1189: tasyāpi pitarastṛptiṃ prayāsyanti na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_15.49 //
GP12vampsm_u:1191: tasmin snātastu puruṣo gosahasraphalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_15.50 //
GP12vampsm_u:1192: pāṇikhāte naraḥ snātvā pitṛn saṃtarpya mānavaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1193: avāpnuyād rājasūyaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca vindati // VamPSm_15.51 //
GP12vampsm_u:1195: tatra tīrthāni muninā miśritāni mahātmanā // VamPSm_15.52 //
GP12vampsm_u:1197: sarvatīrtheṣu sa snāti miśrake snāti yo naraḥ // VamPSm_15.53 //
GP12vampsm_u:1199: manojave naraḥ snātvā miśrake snāti yo naraḥ // VamPSm_15.54 //
GP12vampsm_u:1200: manasā cintitaṃ sarvaṃ sidhyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1201: gatvā madhuvaṭīṃ caiva devyāstīrthaṃ naraḥ śuciḥ // VamPSm_15.55 //
GP12vampsm_u:1202: tatra snātvār'cayed devān pitṝṃśca prayato naraḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1203: sa devyā samanujñāto yathā siddhiṃ labhennaraḥ // VamPSm_15.56 //
GP12vampsm_u:1206: tato vyāsasthalī nāma yatra vyāsena dhīmatā /
GP12vampsm_u:1209: abhigamya sthalīṃ tasya putraśokaṃ na vindati // VamPSm_15.59 //
GP12vampsm_u:1212: yahnaṃ ca sudinaṃ caiva dve tīrthe bhuvi durlabhe /
GP12vampsm_u:1214: kṛtajapyaṃ tato gacchet triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12vampsm_u:1215: tatrābhiṣekaṃ kuvīnta gaṅgāyāṃ prayataḥ sthitaḥ // VamPSm_15.62 //
GP12vampsm_u:1217: koṭitīrthaṃ ca tatraiva dṛṣṭvā koṭīśvaraṃ prabhum // VamPSm_15.63 //
GP12vampsm_u:1219: tato vāmanakaṃ gacchet triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam // VamPSm_15.64 //
GP12vampsm_u:1225: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā naro muktiṃ saṃprayāti na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_15.67 //
GP12vampsm_u:1227: dvādaśyāṃ ca naraḥ snātvā jyeṣṭhatvaṃ labhate nṛpu // VamPSm_15.68 //
GP12vampsm_u:1230: tebhyo dattāni śrāddhāni dānāni vividhāni ca /
GP12vampsm_u:1232: tatraiva koṭitīrthaṃ ca triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12vampsm_u:1233: tasmistīrthe naraḥ snātvā koṭiyajñaphalaṃ labhet // VamPSm_15.71 //
GP12vampsm_u:1236: tatraiva sumahat tīrthaṃ sūryasya ca mahātmanaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:1237: tasmin snātvā bhaktibhuktaḥ sūryaloke mahīyate // VamPSm_15.73 //
GP12vampsm_u:1242: te 'pi tattīrthamāsādya paśyanti paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_15.75 //

GP12vampsm_u:2454: tvaṃ vai dhātā viśvakṛtāṃ vareṇyas tvāṃ pūjayanti praṇatāḥ sadaiva /
GP12vampsm_u:2455: candrādityau cakṣuṣī te bhavān hi tvameva cāgniḥ prapitāmahaśca /
GP12vampsm_u:2456: ārādhya tvāṃ sarakhatīṃ vāglabhante ahorātre nimiṣonmeṣakartā // VamPSm_26.145 //
GP12vampsm_u:2457: na brahmā na ca govindaḥ paurāṇā ṛṣayo na te /
GP12vampsm_u:2458: māhātmyaṃ vedituṃ śaktā yātātathyena śaṅkara // VamPSm_26.146 //
GP12vampsm_u:2460: mahatastamasaḥ pāre goptā mantā bhavān sadā // VamPSm_26.147 //
GP12vampsm_u:2462: jyotiḥ paśyanti yuñjānāstasmai yogātmane namaḥ // VamPSm_26.148 //
GP12vampsm_u:2463: yā mūrtayaśca sūkṣmāste na śakyā yā nidarśitum /
GP12vampsm_u:2464: tābhirmāṃ satataṃ rakṣa pitā putramivaurasam // VamPSm_26.149 //
GP12vampsm_u:2465: rakṣa māṃ rakṣaṇīyo 'haṃ tavānagha namo 'stu te /
GP12vampsm_u:2466: bhaktānukampī bhagavān bhaktaścāhaṃ sadā tvayi // VamPSm_26.150 //
GP12vampsm_u:2473: praviśya vadanaṃ rāhoryaḥ somaṃ pibate niśi /
GP12vampsm_u:2474: grasatyarkaṃ ca kharbhānū rakṣitastava tejasā // VamPSm_26.154 //
GP12vampsm_u:2475: ye cātra patitā garbhā rudragandhasya rakṣeṇa /
GP12vampsm_u:2476: namaste 'stu khadhā khāhā prāpnuvanti tadadbhute // VamPSm_26.155 //
GP12vampsm_u:2478: rakṣantu te hi māṃ nityaṃ te māmāpyāyayantu vai // VamPSm_26.156 //
GP12vampsm_u:2479: ye nadīṣu samudreṣu parvateṣu guhāsu ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2483: ye ca pañcasu bhūteṣu diśāsu vidiśāsu ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2485: rasātalagatā ye ca ye ca tasmāt paraṃ gatāḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2487: yeṣāṃ na vidyate saṃkhyā pramāṇaṃ rūpameva ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2489: prasīda mama bhadraṃ te tava bhāvagatasya ca /
GP12vampsm_u:2490: tvayi me hṛdayaṃ deva tvayi buddhirmatistvayi // VamPSm_26.162 //
GP12vampsm_u:2491: stutvaivaṃ sa mahādevaṃ virarāma dvijottmaḥ // VamPSm_26.163 //
GP12vampsm_u:2497: aho tuṣṭo 'smi te rājan stavenānena suvrata /
GP12vampsm_u:2499: uṣitvā suciraṃ kālaṃ mama gātrodbhavaḥ punaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2500: asuro hyandhako nāma bhaviṣyasi surāntakṛt // VamPSm_27.3 //
GP12vampsm_u:2504: dehaṃ śulena hatvāhaṃ pāvayiṣyāmi samārbudam // VamPSm_27.5 //
GP12vampsm_u:2505: tatrāpyakalmaṣo bhūtvā stutvā māṃ bhaktitaḥ punaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2506: khyātogaṇādhipo bhūtvā nāmnā bhṛṅgiriṭiḥ smṛtaḥ // VamPSm_27.6 //
GP12vampsm_u:2507: matsannidhāne sthitvā tvaṃ tataḥ siddhiṃ gamiṣyasi /
GP12vampsm_u:2508: venaproktaṃ stavamimaṃ kīrtayed yaḥ śṛṇoti ca // VamPSm_27.7 //
GP12vampsm_u:2510: yathā sarveṣu deveṣu viśiṣṭo bhagavāñśivaḥ // VamPSm_27.8 //
GP12vampsm_u:2516: anenaiva tu dehena gaṇānāṃ śreṣṭhatāṃ vrajet // VamPSm_27.11 //
GP12vampsm_u:2517: tejasā yaśasā caiva yukto bhavati nirmalaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2518: na rākṣasāḥ piśācā vā na bhūtā na vināyakāḥ // VamPSm_27.12 //
GP12vampsm_u:2519: vighnaṃ kuryurgṛhe tatra yatrāyaṃ paṭhyate stavaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2520: śruṇuyād yā stavaṃ nārī anujñāṃ prāpya bhartṛtaḥ // VamPSm_27.13 //
GP12vampsm_u:2521: mātṛpakṣe pituḥ pakṣe pūjyā bhavati devavat /
GP12vampsm_u:2522: śruṇuyād yaḥ stavaṃ divyaṃ kīrtayed vā samāhitaḥ // VamPSm_27.14 //
GP12vampsm_u:2523: tasya sarvāṇi kāryāṇa siddhiṃ gacchanti nityaśaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2524: manasā cintitaṃ yacca yacca vācānukīrtitam // VamPSm_27.15 //
GP12vampsm_u:2527: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yattvayā manasepsitam // VamPSm_27.16 //
GP12vampsm_u:2529: asya liṅgasya māhātmyāt tathā liṅgasya darśanāt /
GP12vampsm_u:2530: mukto 'haṃ pātakaiḥ sarvaistava darśanataḥ kila // VamPSm_27.17 //
GP12vampsm_u:2531: yadi tuṣṭo 'si me deva yadi deyo varo mama /
GP12vampsm_u:2537: tasyaitad vacanaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭaḥ provāca śaṅkaraḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2538: eṣo 'pi pāpinirmukto bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // VamPSm_27.21 //
GP12vampsm_u:2540: tathā stavamimaṃ śrutvā mucyate sarvapātakaiḥ // VamPSm_27.22 //
GP12vampsm_u:2542: mama liṅgasya cotpattiṃ śrutvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // VamPSm_27.23 //
GP12vampsm_u:2546: sa ca śvā tatkṣaṇādeva smṛtvā janma purātanam /
GP12vampsm_u:2549: sthāṇatīrthe kuṭīṃ śūnyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokasamanvitaḥ // VamPSm_27.26 //
GP12vampsm_u:2551: satputreṇa tvayā vatsa trāto 'haṃ narakārmavāt // VamPSm_27.27 //
GP12vampsm_u:2553: asya sādhoḥ prasādena sthāṇordevasya darśanāt // VamPSm_27.28 //
GP12vampsm_u:2554: muktāpāpaśca svarlokaṃ yāsye yatra śivaḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2556: sthāṇutīrthe yayau siddhiṃ tena putreṇa tāritaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2557: sa ca śvā paramāṃ siddhiṃ sthāṇutīrthaprabhāvataḥ // VamPSm_27.30 //
GP12vampsm_u:2562: suhṛdo 'tha ṛṇairmuktvā kāmaiḥ saṃtarpya ca striyaḥ /
GP12vampsm_u:2563: abhiṣicya sutaṃ rājye kurukṣetraṃ yayau nṛpaḥ // VamPSm_27.33 //
GP12vampsm_u:2564: tatra taptvā tapo ghoraṃ pūjayitvā ca śaṅkaram /
GP12vampsm_u:2565: ātmecchayā tanuṃ tyaktvā prayātaḥ paramaṃ padam // VamPSm_27.34 //
